questionTitle: His parents gave him everything he asked for. He was thoroughly ...............
He wants to get to the top before he is thirty. He is very ..............

anwers: an instrument used by scientists to determine the age of meteors
an instrument with a pendulum which can be altered to give musicians a regular beat at different speeds

questionTitle: You can give me a receipt if you want to, but your word is ........ for me.
San usually does his work very ............ and well, but today he seemed a little preoccupied .
Besides being expensive, the food in the cafeteria tastes ....................
here since 1976 when her parents moved from New York.
Mary overslept and was ........... late that she missed her bus.
I think it's ............... to take a few more pictures.
Last Sunday was ............. that we took a drive in the country.
The conference was organized for all of the ........... in the state.
I am especially glad that Bob decided to come to the party because we hadn't seen him................. several months.
John and I like to watch the games on TV because we can see more ............. than we could from a seat in the stadium.
John always arrives on time. He's so ..................
She made the ........... mistake of forgetting to put the "s" on the verb in the third person singular.
Before the sermon, the vicar asked the .............. to sit down.
After hours of wandering around in the desert they thought they saw an oasis, but they were wrong. There was nothing there, it was only a .............
The boxer hit his opponent so hard that he was ................ for ten minutes.
The police, despite very careful ............... are still no nearer discovering who the murderer is.
My new glasses cost me .............. the last pair that I bought.
